title: What Has These Feet?
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 51 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 140L
description: What Has These Feet? asks students to view photos of animal feet and guess what animal the feet belong to. Students turn the pages to read the answers and view full photos of each animal. The book is written in a format that teaches phrasing and punctuation for questions and statements. Engaging photos support the text.
meta: animals, elephant, feet, shark, soft, tiger
Use the reading strategy of using prior knowledge to understand text
Ask and Answer Questions : Ask and answer questions
Initial Consonants : Listen for words that begin with the /f/ sound
Consonants : Associate the letter Ff with the /f/ sound
Punctuation : Understand punctuation at the end of questions and statements

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
